```{r}

library(tidyverse)
library(vcdExtra)

lob_a_draft <- read_csv("lobster_size_abundance.csv")
lob_t_draft <- read_csv("lobster_traps.csv")

```

```{r}

lob_a_draft <- as.data.frame(lob_a_draft) #coerce to data.frame
lob_a <- expand.dft(lob_a_draft, freq = "COUNT") #get the data into case format


lob_t <- lob_t_draft %>% 
  mutate(
    lob_year = case_when(
      FISHING_SEASON == "2012-2013" ~ "2012",
      FISHING_SEASON == "2013-2014" ~ "2013",
      FISHING_SEASON == "2014-2015" ~ "2014",
      FISHING_SEASON == "2015-2016" ~ "2015",
      FISHING_SEASON == "2016-2017" ~ "2016"
    )
  )

```
